title: REPORT: John Stamos to be Charged with Driving Under the Influence of Date Rape Drug
title_page: REPORT: John Stamos to be Charged with Driving Under the Influence of Date Rape Drug | Breitbart
text:
Former Full House star John Stamos will be charged with driving under the influence of the date rape drug GHB, TMZ reports.
Stamos was arrested June 12 in Beverly Hills, CA after police spotted him driving erratically. The actor was reportedly “so out of it” he was handcuffed by police and then taken to an area hospital by paramedics.
While hospitalized, he was cited for misdemeanor DUI, however it has been determined the common date rape drug GHB, along with another unnamed nonnarcotic, was found in his system.
GHB is a narcotic sedative that is both odorless and colorless, and is often combined with alcohol and given to victims prior to sexual assaults, however the drug is also used to treat narcolepsy in small doses.
Sources close to Stamos told TMZ the actor was using the drug as a fitness supplement to “lean out mass.”
GHB is often used by body builders, as it is believed the drug helps to stimulate growth hormones and help muscles recover.
TMZ reports a criminal case against Stamos will be filed by the District Attorney soon, and documents from the case will outline which drugs were in his system at the time of his arrest.
Stamos wrote on Twitter the day after his arrest:
Thanks to everyone for their love & support. I'm home & well. Very appreciative of the BHPD & Cedars for their care. — John Stamos (@JohnStamos) June 13, 2015
He later spent a month in a rehab facility.
Stamos will reprise the role of Uncle Jesse Katsopolis on the upcoming Netflix reboot of the family-friendly show Fuller House.
The 52-year-old currently stars as Jimmy Martino, a lifelong bachelor who finds out he is both a father and a grandfather, on Fox network’s Grandfathered.
